fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Culture, Education and training, Environment, Youth, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: UNESCO World Heritage Site, SIDS programmes, Horizon 2020, Economic Commission for Latin America and the Caribbean
organisation_name: Caribbean Research and Management of Biodiversity (Carmabi)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
Association of Marine Laboratories in the Caribbean (AMLC) 
Dutch Caribbean Nature Alliance (DCNA) 
International Society for Reef Studies (ISRS)
goals__remit: All departments (education, consultancy, research and park management) of CARMABI have their own mission and vision statement, but the overall vision of our organization is to be the leading organization in the Caribbean on applied natural sciences by means of knowledge acquisition, knowledge dispersal and nature management applications.
